live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected areas.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
45269.summary: Some customers in the West Abbotsford area are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
45269.title: Dec 22 – West Abbotsford | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
